document_data.name: Leaning Man Inn
document_data.mainbody: The '''Leaning Man Inn''' was an [[inn]] just outside the city of [[Westgate]] in [[1367 DR]].
document_data.Description: The sign for the Leaning Man Inn depicted a standing old man. The sign was tiled at a sharp angle, giving the establishment its name.
document_data.Location: The inn was located beyond the city's [[West Gate (Westgate)|West Gate]].
document_data.Activities: The Leaning Man Inn was a quiet place that promised a secure night's sleep. Its accommodations were fair and the prices were affordable.
